. The CML predicts total advances for 2011 will be? 135bn, but warned that an early rise in interest rates due to inflationary pressures could slow consumer demand. CML economist Peter Charles said: Money market rates have recently moved higher in anticipation of a rise in base rate and some lenders have recently reflected these increases in their product pricing.`` Against this backdrop, consumer demand may be weaker than we would otherwise have expected.`` Higher interest rates will also hit the budgets of existing borrowers, although the expected modest rises in base rate will result in a relatively small proportionate rise in monthly payments for most mortgage holders. According to the Morning News, Dwaine Caraway on Tuesday told Dallas sports radio station 1310 AM that he honored Michael Vick because he thinks the quarterback can be a role model for kids. These kids are the future, and we don't have enough folks out here joining hands and turning lives around, Dwaine Caraway said, href="http://www.dallasnews.com/news/community-news/dallas/headlines/20110208-Mayor Tom-pro-tem-Dwaine Caraway-Dwaine Caraway-says-ceremonial-key-to-Michael Vick-Michael Vick-was-for-the-kids.ece" target="_blank"> according to the newspaper. Since his release from prison in 2009, Michael Vick has voluntarily spoken to kids about how dogfighting is wrong, among other things.
